pr_title: DHFPROD-4096: Middle-tier Update load data API to store settings

timeline.bodyText: Tiny nit - I think it's better just to return the result, there's no value in defining a variable here and then returning it.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Yeah, i forgot simplifying after testing.
replies.author: hao1st
